channel.title: Some issues with multiplayer
channel.description:
Hi, first and foremost, thanks for this great game! I really enjoy it so far. I've found some issues not reported here or in the patch log:
Sometimes after respawning the weapon and hand model is missing. Cannot see which weapon I have out. Sound issues: the tau weapon charge sound cannot be heard when I load it, and a lot of sounds get muted. Happens in all the maps, maybe it is a hardware or driver issue?
No idea how to help you reproduce them or if these are already known.
Cheers.
